document.full_text: 'lysistrata jones,' a new musical by douglas carter beane and lewis flinn, is a modern riff on aristophanes' bawdy comedy.
document.title: theater review | 'lysistrata jones': happy sweating and singing
lines_and_colors: 'lysistrata jones,' a new musical by douglas carter beane and lewis flinn, is a modern riff on aristophanes' bawdy comedy.
